live_updates: We await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38456.summary: Some customers in Selkirk are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38456.title: June 13 – Selkirk | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
